TEXT.TITLE: PROTECTIVE LIFE <PROT> IN ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY:
Protective Life Corp said it has signed a letter of intent to assume <Liberty Life Insurance Co's> group insurance on July 1, subject to regulatory approvals. Terms were not disclosed.
Reuter
